group.label: Bambora Checkout v0.1.0
group.comment: Detailed description of these settings are to be found here.

field.label: Enabled:
field.comment: To enable and disable this payment method.

field.label: Title:
field.comment: The title of the payment method displayed to the customers.

field.label: Merchant number:
field.comment: The number identifying your Bambora merchant account. If you don't know your merchant number, please log into your Bambora account. Go to Settings -> Merchant numbers to view your merchant number.

field.label: Access token:
field.comment: The Access token for the API user received from the Bambora administration. If you don't know your Access token please log into your Bambora account. Go to Settings -> API users to view or create a new API user.

field.label: Secret token:
field.comment: The Secret token for the API user received from the Bambora administration. The Secret token is only displayed to you when you create a new API user and as such you should take note of it. If you have lost your Secret token, log into your Bambora account and create a new API user. Go to Settings -> API users -> Create API users

field.label: MD5 Key:
field.comment: The MD5 key is used to stamp data sent between Magento and Bambora to prevent it from being tampered with. The MD5 key is optional but if used here, must be the same as in the Bambora administration. To view your MD5 key please log into your Bambora account and go to Settings -> Merchant numbers -> Edit

field.label: Payment Window ID:
field.comment: The ID of the payment window to use. You can find the available payment windows in the Bambora administration. Please log into your Bambora account and go to Settings -> Payment windows.

field.label: Instant capture:
field.comment: Set to Yes if you wish to capture payments at the same time they are authorized. In some countries, this is only permitted if the consumer receives the products right away Ex. digital products.

field.label: Immediate Redirect
field.comment: Set to Yes to immediately redirect your customer back to you shop after the payment completed.
